last_episode_to_air.name: Evie's Eighteen
last_episode_to_air.overview: Evie celebrates her eighteenth birthday with her mom and her dad uses a matter transferance unit to come as well (it looks like a outline of him with light accenting the outline) this episode ends with evies mom getting tranported to antares when she steps into the unit to turn it off and troy trapped on earth because donna used it .....the end of the series

name: Out of This World
overview:
Out Of This World is an American fantasy sitcom about a teenage girl who is half alien, which gives her unique supernatural powers. It first aired in syndication from September 17, 1987 and ended on May 25, 1991.

During its first season, the series was originally part of NBC's Prime Time Begins at 7:30 campaign, in which the network's owned-and-operated stations would run first-run sitcoms in the 7:30-8 pm time slot to counterprogram competing stations' game shows, sitcom reruns and other offerings. Out of This World was rotated with the original series Marblehead Manor and She's the Sheriff, a syndicated revival of the 1983 sitcom We Got It Made, and a television adaptation of the play You Can't Take It With You. NBC ended the experiment after the 1987-88 season due to the low ratings put up by three of the series, with Out of This World being one of the two that was renewed. After its first season the series was largely moved to weekend time slots, where it remained until its cancellation following the fourth season.

episodes.name: Evie's Thirteenth Birthday
episodes.overview: After thirteen years of keeping Evie's identity from her, Donna is forced to reveal the truth at her thirteenth birthday party when Evie exhibits a special, alien power that enables her to freeze time. Evie learns she's half alien and that her father is from the planet Antareusâ€”not a CIA agent as her mother has been telling her all along. She is given her father's gift of the cube, a genetic device which allows her to speak to her father on Antareus. Although anyone can hear her father over the cube, her father can only hear Evie.

episodes.name: Playing With the Power
episodes.overview: evie gets grounded by her father after she misuses her powers to win a gift certificate at school and a baseball game her powers are taken away for a week as punishment

episodes.name: The Nightmare
episodes.overview: evie is plaqued by a bad dream about her becoming a monster when she grows up

episodes.name: Till Then
episodes.overview: evie's mom feels a bit neglected by evie because evie is spending so much time with her dad trying to catch up with things

episodes.name: Evie, Get Your Basketball
episodes.overview: evie has a free throwing contest with the new boy in school but she falls in love with him instead and she ends up losing the contest

episodes.name: Every Beano Has His Day
episodes.overview: beano has been given a day of honor by the mayor but evie mistakes him for the mayors dog when she tries to gleap him a top hat and tails and the mayors dog comes in and evie not knowing the dog was there gleaps the dog into her uncle becuase she thinks she messed up with her gleaping

episodes.name: Evie and the Young Astronauts
episodes.overview: Evie is accepted into the young astronaunts program after winning an essay contest and Donna is shocked to find that Evie knows so much about science and outer space, but after accidentally playing one of Evie's tapes while cleaning her room, she discovers that all the information in the essay really came from Troy.

episodes.name: Fifties Mom
episodes.overview: evie wishes for a fifties mom while watching a 5o's show  my favorite mom on tv and when the show is not on the enxt day she has to liev another 24 hours with a 50's mom

episodes.name: Dueling Mayors
episodes.overview: it's reeclection time for the mayor of marlowe and his running mate is no other than charles nelson riely

episodes.name: Baby Talk
episodes.overview: evie babysits a little baby named neil and she wishes that she could understand him and because of a lightning storm neil starts talking to her

episodes.name: Beano's New Diet Clinic
episodes.overview: bano and donna try to help a over weight child at evie's school by trying to get jackie gleason to come to the opening of beano's diet clinic

episodes.name: Uh, Oh... Here Comes Mother
episodes.overview: donna and beano's mom come for a visit and she falls in love with kyle

episodes.name: The Anniversary
episodes.overview: donna is all happy and she has put a heart around the date on the calendar what is up on this date? she can be with troy in a way when the plavnets align once a yera on the same day

episodes.name: To Tell the Truth
episodes.overview: a crystal egg troy left causes havoc whe it is foun d out it is a truth device

episodes.name: Pen Pals
episodes.overview: evie and donna try to find a woman for beano in the personals section of the paper but when evie replaces beanos' picture for kyles and then diane shows up evie has to confess whjat she did

episodes.name: Broadway Danny Derek
episodes.overview: evie dislikes the new boy in school and donna encourages her to be nice to him untill she meets his dad who is just as bad

episodes.name: Mosquito Man: the Motion Picture
episodes.overview: they are making a movie version of kyle's old tv show but they want him to retire in the film and kyle doesn't want that

episodes.name: The Russians Are Coming
episodes.overview: russia thinks there is a nuclar resaerch lab in the garland house aso they send donna and beano on a fake trip to hawaii and have some one from moscow who is made up to look just like donna take her place tryin to find out what is going on in the house because there is a power surge there

episodes.name: AKA: Dad
episodes.overview: donna and beano's mom come for a visit again and this time she thinks buzz is troy as she sees them doing a intimaite dance when she comes

episodes.name: The Illness
episodes.overview: evie gets the measles antaerian stlye which means blue dots on her face

episodes.name: The Box Is Missing
episodes.overview: after evie and donna come back from san francisco evie finds the cube is missing !

episodes.name: Boy Crazy
episodes.overview: donna makes evie meet what donna thinks is the minister's new daughter lelsie but it turns out to be a boy that donna does not seem to like because of the way he dresses-punk like

episodes.name: The Three Faces of Evie
episodes.overview: evie begins to want to look older when chris becomes gaga over a older woman

episodes.name: I've Got a Secret
episodes.overview: evie's secret is revealed when lindsey sleeps over and accidently hears evie's dad trough the cube

episodes.name: Career Crunch
episodes.overview: The time has finally come for Donna when she opens up her new catering business called ""Donna's Delights"", but when Evie accidentally gleaps the cookies for one of Donna's parties  into space cookies, that put people to sleep, it is up to Beano to try and get the cookies before anyone eats them.

episodes.name: Should Old Acquaintance Be Forgot?
episodes.overview: Kyle discovers that, Jim, his old buddy from high school is coming for a visit and Kyle is determined to shape himself up to impress Jim after remembering how Jim always had everything that he didn't, but when Jim gets to the house, Kyle realizes he is handicapped.

episodes.name: Evie's First Kiss
episodes.overview: It's the night Evie has been waiting for, her first, real date alone with Chris, but when Chris kisses her for the first time, Evie gets the wrong idea and thinks that they are a couple.

episodes.name: Princess Evie
episodes.overview: A visiting prince is coming to Marlowe and everyone is anxious to meet him except Evie, until she finds herself attracted to him, but if sweeping Evie off her feet, with his good looks and charm, wasn't enough- the prince asks Evie to marry him.

episodes.name: Old Flame
episodes.overview: When Donna discovers that her old beau, Rob Jamison, is coming to Marlowe for their class reunion, she invites him over to the house hoping that they can catch up and reminisce on old times, but when Evie catches him kissing her mother, it misleads Evie to believing that her mother no longer loves her father.

episodes.name: Guess Who's Coming to Earth
episodes.overview: Evies grandfather from outer space visits. He wants to take Evie home with him to meet her dad. Will Evie choose to stay?

episodes.name: Go West, Young Mayor
episodes.overview: Evie, Donna, Beano, and Kyle decide to take a vacation, but on thier way, they get lost in a western ghost town and meet two men who claim that they run the town but are really counterfeiters, and when Evie, Beano, and Donna find out what they are up to, the counterfeiters kidnap them, and it is up to cowboy Kyle to rescue them.

episodes.name: Close Encounters of the Nerd Kind
episodes.overview: There's a new boy in town named Elroy who everyone thinks is a nerd, and when Evie feels sorry for him, she accepts his invitation to go to the ""Sock Hop"" so that he won't feel disliked.

episodes.name: The Incredible Hunk
episodes.overview: A talent agent spots Chris at the ""Goodie Goodie"" and wants him to pose as a surfing model, but Chris declines, so Evie convinces him to go for it, but when Chris becomes popular with the ladies, Evie realizes that convincing him to go for it was a big mistake.

episodes.name: Pupil's Court
episodes.overview: After Lindsay puts her favorite tape into Evie's stereo, the tape and the stereo both get ruined, and when the girls both refuse to pay each other back for the damages, they take it out in student court.

episodes.name: Evie's Two Dads
episodes.overview: The father/daughter dance is coming up and Evie decides that she doesn't want to take her uncle Beano anymore after realizing that she has a great father, and when a school girl picks on Evie for never bringing her father to the dance, Evie gleaps up a really cool dad to impress everybody.

episodes.name: The Secret of Evie's Success
episodes.overview: Evie decides to get a job and is hired as a waitress at the ""Goodie Goodie"", but when she uses her powers to help her on the job and becomes waitress of the month, she causes and old, experienced waitress to lose her job.

episodes.name: Honest Evie
episodes.overview: Evie decides to run for class president, but when she wishes that she had someone experienced in politics to guide her, she accidently gleaps up Abraham Lincoln.

episodes.name: Evie Goes to Hollywood
episodes.overview: Evie and the gang decide to go to Hollywood for a vacation, and while Evie and Lindsay go on an adventure to look for Tom Cruise, the rest of the gang have some adventures of their own.

episodes.name: Two Many Evies
episodes.overview: While Evie is stuck at home, writing a petition to end school uniforms, she is missing Billy Sullivan's birthday party, so she decides to split herself in two to be at two places at the same time, but doesn't realize that after midnight she can't rejoin herself.

episodes.name: Futile Attraction
episodes.overview: Beano feels unattractive when all the women he likes keep rejecting him, so Evie gleeps his cologne into a love potion that will attract women everywhere he goes.

episodes.name: Beano the Kid
episodes.overview: After Evie finds Beano's old childhood bike in the garage, Beano flashes back and starts to wish that he was a kid again, but when Evie gleeps Beano into a ten year old, he not only becomes a child but also a huge annoyance.

episodes.name: Queens for a Day
episodes.overview: Evie is determined to win the mother/daughter pageant after a school snob, Cissy, brags about how easily she will win, but after Cissy messes up the finale of her and her mother's act, Evie purposely sabotages her and Donna's act so that Cissy and her mother will win.

episodes.name: Whose House Is It, Anyway?
episodes.overview: Kyle accidently slips on Donna's kitchen floor after she has waxed it and is told by the doctor to stay off his feet for 24 hours, so asks Donna and Evie if they can take care of him for a day, but when he realizes how good he has it at the Garland house, he pretends that he is still injured so that he won't have to leave.

episodes.name: Frisky Business
episodes.overview: After throwing a party in the house while Donna is out, Evie discovers that her mother's clock is missing, so she and Lindsay cater a bridal shower to raise the money to buy a new clock before Donna finds out that it is gone.

episodes.name: Star Dog
episodes.overview: Troy contacts Evie after discovering that Anterius has the power to send creatures through outer space, so sends an Anterian dog to show Evie how it works and lets Evie keep him for the weekend.

episodes.name: Evie's Sweet Sixteen
episodes.overview: Evie is turning 16 and Troy, once again, has another spectacular gift for her. Troy gives Evie a list of ten powers to try out throughout the day and she has until midnight to decide which one of the ten powers that she would like to keep.

episodes.name: Cinderella Evie
episodes.overview: When Donna refuses to buy Evie a new dress for a senior party at the Ritz Marlowe, Evie gleaps up the dress so that she can look stunning, but doesn't realize that there is going to be a major gleap out at midnight which will reverse the gleap that she made.

episodes.name: Bring Me the Head of Donna Garland
episodes.overview: Beano decides to act as a magician for an amateur's night, but when he uses Evie as an assistant to try out a ""Disappearing Act"" on Donna, Donna disappear's into another dimension because of Evie's powers, and when Donna starts to reappear, the only thing that comes back is her head.

episodes.name: A Froggy Day In Marlowe Town
episodes.overview: Buzz claims that he and his frog, Farley, need some space from each other, so asks Donna to take care of him for a while, but when Evie discovers that Chris is going behind her back to spend time with Lindsey, she gleaps Farley into a handsome young man to try and make Chris jealous.

episodes.name: Eviegeist
episodes.overview: When Evie gets the Antarean flu, her powers go out of control, and when Kyle happens to witness Evie's powers in action, he believes that there is a ghost in the Garland house so hires a woman to drive the ghost out, but after the woman leaves, Evie and Donna discover that there really is a ghost in the house.

episodes.name: Evie's Driver's License
episodes.overview: Its time for Evie to take her driver's license test and ends up getting a very strict and mean driving instructor who will be giving the test, and when he puts too much pressure on her to parallel park, she uses her powers to help her pass the test.

episodes.name: Evie Goes for the Gold
episodes.overview: Evie has a crush on the new gymnastics coach, Scott Gold, and uses her powers to help her make the gymnastics team just so she can spend time with him.

episodes.name: Hair Today, Gone Tomorrow
episodes.overview: When Evie finds a Anterean hair restorer that her grandfather, Zelik, left behind, Beano decides to market it to make himself rich, but after trying it out on Kyle, Chris, and Buzz, thier hair turns into beehive hairdo's.

episodes.name: Around the World in 80 Minutes
episodes.overview: Evie's grandfather, Zelik, is back to visit and wants to take Evie around the world as a gift, but when Donna refuses to let Evie go, they sneak out in the middle of the night to go on their journey- little do they know that things aren't going to go as smoothly as they planned.

episodes.name: It's A Cruel World
episodes.overview: A popular guy at school is suddenly interested in Lindsay and Evie can't figure out why, until he reveals to Evie that the only reason he is going out with Lindsay is so she will give him the answers to the upcoming history finals.

episodes.name: Evie / Stevie
episodes.overview: Lindsay is crushed when she is dumped by the man who was suppose to take her to the sophmore dance at school, and when Evie feels bad that Lindsay won't be going, she gleaps herself to look like a man so that Lindsay can have a date for the dance.

episodes.name: The Rocks That Couldn't Roll
episodes.overview: As class president, Evie must find a way to raise money for the school and gets an idea from Kyle to put on a benefit concert, and not only does he give Evie the idea, he also plans on helping her get, rock group, the ""Fine Young Vegetarians"" to be the guest performers, but when they can't make it, Evie gleaps Beano's rock collection into the rock group so that she won't have to let the school down.

episodes.name: One In a Million
episodes.overview: When Donna goes to her night school class, Evie promises that she will stay home and study for her upcoming finals, but when Lindsay persuades Evie to go out to the ""Goodie Goodie"" instead, Evie ends up being the one millionth customer, and when she discovers that her picture will be on the front page of the paper, she must keep the paper away from Donna the next day so that she won't know that Evie went out instead of staying home.

episodes.name: Four Men and a Baby
episodes.overview: Beano must babysit his girlfriend's baby boy, Billy, but doesn't realize that Billy is a little menace, and when he goes to a game and sticks Billy with Evie, she gleaps him into a 30 year old so that she can understand him.

episodes.name: Evie's Double Trouble
episodes.overview: Evie is a little irritated about having to get a new retainer, but if that wasn't enough, the retainer causes Evie to gleap involuntary and she ends up gleaping two twin ladies from a mouthwash commercial anytime she or someone else around her says the word ""mouth"".

episodes.name: The Garden of Evie
episodes.overview: Evie accidentaly gleaps Donna's ivy into a woman named Inga, and when Kyle meets her, he falls in love and wants to marry her.

episodes.name: Evie's Magic Touch
episodes.overview: Evie is thrilled when Chris invites her to his senior prom, but when Chris becomes the new supervisor at ""Chicken in a Basket"", he is forced to work on the night of the prom.

episodes.name: Cowboy Kyle, Man of Granite
episodes.overview: Kyle is a little frightened when having to proove to his cowboy buddies that he is strong enough to do anything, so wishes that he were as hard as a rock, but when Evie tries to help him, she accidently gleaps him, literally, as hard as a rock.

episodes.name: Evie's Secret Admirer
episodes.overview: Evie is getting love letters from a secret admirer but can't figure out who it is, and when the time finally comes for Evie to finally meet him, he ends up being Lindsay's 12 year old brother.

episodes.name: Evie's Yuppie Love
episodes.overview: Evie and Chris must do a marriage project for school that teaches them about family financing, but when Chris shows no interest into thier project, Evie gleaps Chris into a more responsible husband.

episodes.name: Diamonds Are Evie's Best Friend
episodes.overview: evie gleaps up a diamond necklace for her mom when she finds out that it is anterian mother's day

episodes.name: A Kinder, Gentler Mayor
episodes.overview: It's reelection time and Kyle is once again running for mayor, but starts to feel like his position is undeserved when no one else will run against him, so when Donna decides to help Kyle, by running for mayor, she not only becomes well appreciated by the town of Marlowe, but she wins the election.

episodes.name: Goodbye, Mr. Chris
episodes.overview: When Chris gets rejected from the college of his choice, he decides to enlist into the marines, but once he does, he realizes how much he would rather be in school than in the marines.

episodes.name: New Kid on the Block
episodes.overview: There's a new guy in town and Evie makes a date with him so she can show him around Marlowe to make him feel welcome, but when Chris comes back to Marlowe, after transfering to ""Marlowe Community College"", Evie tries to hide from Chris so that he won't know that she is seeing someone else.

episodes.name: My Little Evie
episodes.overview: It's Donna and Troy's anniversary, once again, and this time, Troy decides to do something really special for her, so asks Evie to buy a music box, so that he can put a special song in it for Donna, but while attempting to put the song in the music box, he accidentaly shrinks Evie.

episodes.name: Forget Your Troubles
episodes.overview: When Donna is bribed by a man who wants the land in Marlowe that she is giving away, she decides to take him to court to punish him, but when she gets overwhelmed with stress, she wishes that she could just forget about everything for a while, and when Evie tries to help her, she accidentaly gives Donna amnesia.

episodes.name: A Mind Is a Terrible Thing to Read
episodes.overview: Donna's television show, ""Meet the Mayor"", is scheduled to be cancelled after failing to pull in viewers, so the gang put together a telethon to keep the show on the air, and when Evie and Lindsay try to do a mind reading trick for entertainment, the trick doesn't fool anyone, so she asks Troy to give her the power to read minds.

episodes.name: Evie's Guardian Angel
episodes.overview: Donna hires Peter to put in new shelves for the kitchen, but while he's there, things start mysteriously disappearing in the house, and on thier way home, Donna and Evie catch Peter talking to Troy through the cube and discover that Peter is really an alien from Anterias as well as Evie'e guardian angel.

episodes.name: Best Friends
episodes.overview: Donna's old friend, Sandy, is coming to visit, but Donna isn't too thrilled after remembering how Sandy was so much more popular than her and how she took the guy that Donna liked back in high school, and when Evie starts to spend all her time with Sandy, Donna feels that Sandy is now taking away her daughter.

episodes.name: I Want My Evie TV
episodes.overview: Evie's Uncle Mick has returned home to Marlowe after being on the road with his band, and when Evie discovers that he is a talented guitar player, she asks him to help her make a music video for her school project, but instead Chris takes Evie's music video and submits it to a talent search contest.

episodes.name: Come Fly With Evie
episodes.overview: When Kyle must take a plane to New York for a police convention, Evie discovers that he is afraid to fly, so Donna and Evie create a ""fear of flying"" program to help Kyle overcome his fear, but when Evie pretends that the are taking off, the house really does take off because of Evie's powers.

episodes.name: Roomies
episodes.overview: While Mick is out of town for a week, he allows Evie and Lindsay to stay at his apartment so that they can see what it's like to live together before they go away to college, but only after a few hours alone, the girls start to disagree.

episodes.name: Evie's High Anxiety
episodes.overview: When Chris decides to enter a dance contest with another woman, Evie gleaps herself into a fantastic dancer to get Chris back, but because of a gleap intensification, her powers become ten times thier normal strengh and she becomes so light on her feet that she starts to float in the air.

episodes.name: Evie's False Alarm
episodes.overview: Donna is conned into buying a alarm system for the house, and when she and Evie realize that it was a scam, they come up with a plan to try and get thier money back.

episodes.name: Marlowe Vice
episodes.overview: Lindsay decides to be a student officer just to goof off and skip classes and persuades Evie to be her partner in crime, but when Lindsay dicovers that there is a thief stealing food from the cafeteria, she suddenly becomes serious about her postion and tries to catch the culprit, only Evie cathes him instead, and the thief ends up being Jeff.

episodes.name: Evie's Latin Touch
episodes.overview: Evie decides to take part in the student exchange program and let's a young latin boy stay with her, and when she discovers that that his whole life is all work and no play, she teaches him to have a little fun by taking him to play baseball.

episodes.name: My Mom, and Why I Love Her
episodes.overview: Evie's grandmother sends her a check in the mail, for $200, that is suppose to go toward her college fund, but Evie spends the money on a jacket instead, and in order to keep Donna from finding out that she spent the money instead of putting it in the bank, she enters a contest titled ""My Mom and Why I Love Her"" to try to win the money back.

episodes.name: Heck's Angels
episodes.overview: Evie volunteers to tutor a 22 year old high school student so that he can get his diploma, but he ends up being a rough, tough, motorcycle biker named ""Moose"", and when his girlfriend, Velma, finds out that she is spending time with him, she warns Evie to stay away from him....or else.

episodes.name: Would You Buy a Used Car From This Dude
episodes.overview: Chris decides that he wants to go to school to be a doctor but he just can't afford it, so gets a job as a car salesman to help him pay for school, and when Evie discovers that Chris just can't sell anything, she gleaps him into the best car salesman in the entire place.

episodes.name: Evie Nightingale
episodes.overview: Evie and Lindsay sneak into the hospital and pretend to be candy stripers after they discover that thier favorite soap star will be staying there, but instead of getting his autograph, they end up getting trouble.

episodes.name: All About Evie
episodes.overview: Evie tries out for the role of Juliet for the town play, only Lindsay gets the part instead, so Donna assigns Evie as the understudy, but when Lindsay gets carried away about being Juliet, Evie gets angry and gleaps her into a poodle.

episodes.name: Mayor Evie
episodes.overview: Evie becomes Donna's new mayor's assistant, but when Donna won't give Evie any responsibilty to do the job, Evie gleaps herself into Donna to sign a concert permit when Donna is not around to do it herself, but it only causes problems when the citizens of Marlowe don't approve of the performer.

episodes.name: Stump Your Neighbor
episodes.overview: It's Evie, Kyle, and Mick vs. Donna, Lindsay, and Buzz in a popular game show titled ""Stump Your Neighbor"", but while Donna and Kyle are fighting to win for their pride, the rest of the gang are just looking to win a new Ferrari.

episodes.name: Evie's Three Promises
episodes.overview: Evie accidentally makes three dates for the same night, but rather than disappointing anyone, Evie decides to juggle her dates by teleporting herself from place to place throughout the night.

episodes.name: Too Late for Evie
episodes.overview: Evie breaks her curfew, once again, for the third weekend in a row and Donna gets furious at Evie for making her worry, but Evie just can't understand why her mother worries so much when she stays out late, until one night when Donna goes out, gets locked in Kyle's apartment and dosen't come home.

episodes.name: Educating Kyle
episodes.overview: When Kyle reveals to Evie and Donna that he never graduated from high school, Donna informs him that in order to keep his job as police chief, he must go back to high school to get his diploma, but when he does, he accidentaly gets Evie in trouble for cheating on her history final when in fact he was the one cheating.

episodes.name: Evie's Eighteen
episodes.overview: Evie celebrates her eighteenth birthday with her mom and her dad uses a matter transferance unit to come as well (it looks like a outline of him with light accenting the outline) this episode ends with evies mom getting tranported to antares when she steps into the unit to turn it off and troy trapped on earth because donna used it .....the end of the series
